H0.text: Flow chart is the best tool to help the student organize the data of rising temperature of heated water measured every two minutes over a 20‑minute period.

H1.text: Pie chart is the tool that will best help the student organize the data from measuring the rising temperature of heated water for 20 minutes in two‑minute intervals.

H2.text: A data table is the best tool to help the student organize the rising temperature measurements of heated water taken over 20 minutes at two‑minute intervals.

H3.text: A bar graph will best help the student organize the data collected by measuring the rising temperature of heated water for 20 minutes in two‑minute intervals.

A4.text: Tables are widely used in communication, research, and data analysis.

A5.text: They can condense large amount of information to a limited space and therefore they are popular in scientific literature in many fields of study.
